Title: Relates to requiring the people to serve defendants notice alleging that the defendant and the person alleged to be the victim of such crime were members of the same family or household
Summary: Requires the people to serve defendants notice alleging that the defendant and the person alleged to be the victim of such crime were members of the same family or household within 45 days of arraignment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to requiring the people to serve defendants notice alleging that the defendant and the person alleged to be the victim of such crime were members of the same family or household
